title: Ticket #7555: Reading service account credentials broken in gce_gahp
description:
The gce_gahp fails to read service account credentials from the new sqlite-format credentials file generated by the gcloud client tool for Google Cloud.

In the sqlite format, the access token and expiration date are stored in a secondary file (access_tokens.db). The code in the gahp for reading service account credentials throws an error if these values aren't in the primary credentials.db file. The code for reading regular user account credentials works properly.
